author: Simon Johnstone
comment: Better than most binary faces. Would like to see options to change size, select color and brightness for low power mode.  There is no need for zero placer on hour. Would also like to have a 99 cent version with no logo, nor HRS with time centered in center of screen, top row with 4 dots, second row with 6 dots.

author: William Gongola
comment: Great, much better than other binary watch faces but can you take the DoSo off the face?
title: Logo on the front?
